function.arguments:
{"return_type": "give_answer", "final_answer": "Manchester United Football Club, commonly known as Man Utd, is a professional football club based in Manchester, England. The club was founded on April 24, 1902. Their home stadium is Old Trafford, which has a total capacity of 74,879 seats. Manchester United currently competes in the Premier League, the top tier of English football.

Key facts about Manchester United:
- Full Name: Manchester United Football Club
- Founded: April 24, 1902
- Stadium: Old Trafford (Capacity: 74,879)
- Location: Sir Matt Busby Way, Manchester, M16 0RA
- Phone: +44 1616767770
- Website: www.manutd.com
- Squad Size: 27
- Average Age: 26.73
- National Players: 19

For more detailed information about the squad and player profiles, you can visit their official website or check out their profile on transfermarkt.com."}
function.name: Finish
